price: Disseram: "Ó Moisés! Lançarás tua vara ou seremos os primeiros que lançaremos as nossas?"
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنۡ أَلۡقَىٰ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāmūsā immā an tul'qiya wa-immā an nakūna awwala man alqā
